messages.content: What is Form 1095-A?
Form 1095-A reports Marketplace (ACA) health insurance and is required to complete Form 8962. I can help you figure out what to do next. Just tell me what form or situation you're working on.
Why do I need Form 1095-A?
If you received advance premium tax credits (APTC), you must reconcile them on Form 8962. I can help you figure out what to do next. Just tell me what form or situation you're working on.
What is APTC?

Sure! Here's the breakdown:
Advance Premium Tax Credit is the subsidy paid by the Marketplace to reduce your monthly insurance premium.
If you’d like, I can walk you through how this applies to your specific tax situation.
What is PTC?

Premium Tax Credit is the final credit calculated on your tax return based on income. Don’t worry—you're doing great. If you want, I can explain how this fits into the next step of your filing process.
